availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Newman (Metcalfe County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Postmaster in Barren County in 1842. Owned three enslaved persons in Barren County in 1850. Merchant in Barren County in 1850. Postmaster in Barren County in 1857. Owned five enslaved persons in Metcalfe County in 1860. Merchant in Metcalfe County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, p. 428A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe County, p. 955
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, p. 207
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe County, p. 66B
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 110, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
